name: Bgloop
body:
### Welcome bGLOOP
bGLOOP is a reimplementation of the [GLOOP library](http://www.brd.nrw.de/lerntreffs/informatik/structure/material/sek2/einfuehrungen/gloop.php), a library for teaching beginner courses for OOP in Java with application to 3d programming.
It is basically a wrapper to the basic functionality in [jogl](http://www.jogamp.org). It's main focus is to make creation
of small 3d programs really simple to focus on the basic ideas of OOP.

The API is in German.

### Documentation
Have a look at the [javadoc](http://trent2.github.io/bGLOOP/apidocs/index.html).

### Examples
Will follow soon.
